body_html: There are many types of tf.Operation, some of them does return None, and it serves as grouping ops together, example being training ops returned by optimizer.minimize. Just returning nothing does not mean it's doing nothing, it actually run all the ops that are being grouped.
body_text: There are many types of tf.Operation, some of them does return None, and it serves as grouping ops together, example being training ops returned by optimizer.minimize. Just returning nothing does not mean it's doing nothing, it actually run all the ops that are being grouped.
body: There are many types of tf.Operation, some of them does return None, and it serves as grouping ops together, example being training ops returned by optimizer.minimize. Just returning nothing does not mean it's doing nothing, it actually run all the ops that are being grouped.
